Detailed Description

A simple class to manipulate angles for 3D transforms

This class converts a vector composed of angles in degrees into radians.

For instance, if the object is built like this :

UAngle3D alpha = new UAngle3D(60,45,90); The angles returned by the accessors will be :Math.PI/3,Math.PI/4 and Math.PI/2.
